doc:
Jim Moran (publicist) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Moran_(publicist) 0 James Sterling Moran (January 1, 1908 – October 18, 1999) was a publicist and a press agent for film studios, manufacturers, retailers, Washington politicians from the 1930s to the 1980s. In 1989, Time ranked him as "the supreme master of that most singular marketing device--the publicity stunt." James_Sterling_Moran ( January_1_,_1908 – October_18_,_1999 ) was a_publicist and a_press_agent for film_studios , manufacturers , retailers , Washington_politicians from the_1930s to the_1980s . In 1989 , Time ranked him as " the_supreme_master of that_most_singular_marketing_device -- the_publicity_stunt .
